snippet.title: Dragonium Adventure | Reveal Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Fight and make your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG!
Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, upgrade your character, unlock new skills and join the fray in online multiplayer mode!

Dragonium Adventure will be available in early 2023 on Steam for Windows (64-bit), macOS, Linux (64-bit) operating systems and Steam Deck.

A free Steam Demo will be released in December 2022, so stay tuned!

The game will also be released for Android devices on the Google Play Store during the course of 2023.

#DragoniumAdventure #Steam #IndieGame
